resources.string: Outgoing calls are restricted by FDN.
"You can't make outgoing calls while call barring is on."
All calls are restricted by access control.
அவசரகால அழைப்புகள் அணுகல் கட்டுப்பாடு மூலம் கட்டுப்படுத்தப்பட்டுள்ளன.
இயல்பான அழைப்புகள் அணுகல் கட்டுப்பாடு மூலம் கட்டுப்படுத்தப்பட்டுள்ளன.
No குரலஞ்சல் number is stored on the SIM card.
உங்கள் சிம் கார்டு unblocked. உங்கள் போன் is unlocking…
Use default operator ஸெட்டிங்க்ஸ் to display my number in outgoing calls
During a call, notify me of incoming calls
During a call, notify me of incoming calls
"Your operator doesn't support disabling call forwarding when your ஃபோன் is busy."
"Your operator doesn't support disabling call forwarding when your ஃபோன் doesn't answer."
"Your carrier doesn't support disabling call forwarding when your ஃபோன் is unreachable."
"Your ஃபோன் app's Fixed Dialing Numbers setting is turned on. As a result, some call-related features aren't working."
Turn on the radio before viewing these ஸெட்டிங்க்ஸ்.
"குரலஞ்சல் எண்ணை மாற்ற முடியவில்லை. Contact your carrier if this problem persists."
"Couldn't change the forwarding number. Contact your carrier if this problem persists."
"Couldn't retrieve and save current forwarding number ஸெட்டிங்க்ஸ். Switch to the new provider anyway?"
"Your SIM card doesn't allow a connection to this நெட்வொர்க்."
இப்போது இந்த நெட்வொர்க் இணைக்க இயலாது. பின்னர் மீண்டும் முயற்சி.
Enable data access over மொபைல் நெட்வொர்க்
Connect to data services when ரோமிங்
Connect to data services when ரோமிங்
"You've lost data connectivity because you left your home நெட்வொர்க் with data ரோமிங் turned off."
Allow data ரோமிங்? You may incur significant ரோமிங் charges!

"%1$s maximum exceeded Data rate reduced to %2$d Kb/s"
"%1$d٪ of cycle elapsed Next period starts in %2$d days (%3$s)"
Data rate reduced to %1$d Kb/s if data use limit is exceeded

உள்ளூர் ஏர்போர்ட் விமான கால அட்டவணைகள் enabled
உள்ளூர் ஏர்போர்ட் விமான கால அட்டவணைகள் disabled
"FDN wasn't updated because you typed an incorrect PIN."
"FDN wasn't updated because the number can't exceed 20 digits."
"FDN wasn't updated. The PIN2 was incorrect, or the ஃபோன் number was rejected."
No contacts on your SIM card.
To import contacts from the SIM card, first turn off Airplane mode.
"The old PIN you typed isn't correct. Try again."
"The PINs you typed don't match. Try again."
Type a PIN that is 4 to 8 numbers.
The PIN you typed was incorrect.
தவறான கடவுச்சொல், SIM is locked! PUK2 requested.
"The PUK2 you typed isn't correct. Try again."
"The old PIN2 you typed isn't correct. Try again."
"The PIN2s you typed don't match. Try again."
Type a PIN2 that is 4 to 8 numbers.
Type a PUK2 that is 8 numbers.
தவறான கடவுச்சொல். Change PIN2 and retry.
தவறான கடவுச்சொல், SIM is locked. PUK2 requested.
To place a call, first turn off Airplane mode.
Call not sent, no valid number entered.
Call not sent. %s is not an emergency number!
Call not sent. Dial an emergency number!
Set the length of DTMF tones

"A special call needs to be made to activate your ஃபோன் service.
After pressing “Activate”, listen to the instructions provided to activate your ஃபோன்."

"If you skip activation, you can't place calls or connect to மொபைல் data networks (though you can connect to Wi-Fi networks). Until you activate your ஃபோன், you are asked to activate it each time you turn it on."
Follow the spoken instructions until you hear that activation is complete.
Wait while your ஃபோன் is being programmed.
Your ஃபோன் is now activated. It may take up to 15 minutes for service to start.

"Your ஃபோன் didn't activate. You may need to find an area with better coverage (near a window, or outside).
Try again or call customer service for more options."
"The selected action isn't available while in an emergency call."
For all calls when data நெட்வொர்க் is available
Always use to place Internet calls
You can change which Internet calling account to use by default from the ஃபோன் > ஸெட்டிங்க்ஸ் > Internet call ஸெட்டிங்க்ஸ் > Accounts screen.
There are no Internet calling accounts on this ஃபோன். Do you want to add one now?
Account registration stopped because there is no Internet connection.
Account registration stopped because there is no Wi-Fi connection.
Account registration unsuccessful: (%s); will try later
Account registration unsuccessful: Incorrect username or password.
Account registration unsuccessful: Check the server name.
This account is currently in use by the %s app.
"%s is required and can't be left blank."
Port number should be within 1000 and 65534.
To place an Internet call, check your Internet connection first.
You need to be connected to a Wi-Fi நெட்வொர்க் for Internet calls (use the Wireless & நெட்வொர்க் ஸெட்டிங்க்ஸ்).

"Add numbers that don't require an IP prefix"
